trans-unit.source: If your managed users run into issues with their accounts, you can send them to your company's support resources instead of the default Box customer support.
trans-unit.target: Als uw beheerde gebruikers problemen met hun accounts ondervinden, kunt u hen verwijzen naar de supportmedewerkers van uw bedrijf in plaats van naar de klantenondersteuning van Box.

trans-unit.source: Box sends automated email notifications on behalf of users when they take certain actions in Box - for example, adding collaborators to a folder. You can add an email signature with additional information, such as a privacy notice, to these automated emails.
trans-unit.target: Box verzendt automatische e-mailmeldingen namens gebruikers wanneer deze bepaalde handelingen uitvoeren in Box, bijvoorbeeld wanneer zij medebewerkers toevoegen aan een map. U kunt een e-mailhandtekening met extra informatie aan deze automatische e-mails toevoegen, zoals een privacykennisgeving.

trans-unit.source: Create a custom in-product message to communicate with your managed users. This message will appear in the upper right-hand corner of the Box homepage.
trans-unit.target: Maak een aangepast bericht in het product om informatie te geven aan uw beheerde gebruikers. Dit bericht verschijnt in de rechterbovenhoek van de Box-startpagina.

trans-unit.source: URL must start with http:// or https://
trans-unit.target: URL moet beginnen met http:// of https://
trans-unit.note: {"sourceComment":" Error message for when missing http from url","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463428556000}
{"sourceComment":" Displayed in color picker popup for the old color","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1458180068000}

trans-unit.source: Invalid URL. Custom URL must be an alphanumeric value
trans-unit.target: Ongeldige URL. Aangepaste URL moet een alfanumerieke waarde zijn
URL mag niet beginnen met www

trans-unit.source: Set up your company name and then create the custom URL your managed users will use to log into Box.
trans-unit.target: Voer uw bedrijfsnaam in en maak vervolgens de aangepaste URL waarmee uw beheerde gebruikers inloggen op Box.

trans-unit.source: Requires at least one non-whitespace character
trans-unit.target: Er is ten minste één niet-spatieteken vereist

trans-unit.source: You are about to change the Permission for {numberOfSelection} {numberOfSelection, plural, =1 {folder} other {folders}} to {permission}.
trans-unit.target: U staat op het punt de machtigingen voor {numberOfSelection} {numberOfSelection, plural, =1 {map} other {mappen}} te wijzigen in {permission}.

trans-unit.source: Folder name has exceeded its limit.
trans-unit.note: {"sourceComment":" Error message shown when user is trying to create a folder with a folder name that is too long","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"REVIEW_NEEDED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463187201000}

{"sourceComment":" Error message shown when user is trying to create a folder with an empty folder name","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"REVIEW_NEEDED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463187202000}

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for the new folder. You may use alphanumeric characters and some symbols. Folder will use default collaboration settings.
trans-unit.target: Voer een naam in voor de nieuwe map. U mag alfanumerieke tekens en bepaalde symbolen gebruiken. De standaardinstellingen voor samenwerking zijn van toepassing op de map.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem updating your settings.
trans-unit.target: Er is een probleem opgetreden bij het bijwerken van uw instellingen.

trans-unit.source: Apologies, we were unable to load this.
Please refresh the page or try again later.
trans-unit.target: Vernieuw de pagina of probeer het later opnieuw.

trans-unit.note: {"sourceComment":" link to the help page about what custom branding is about","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463428536000}
{"sourceComment":" Theme form update is being sent and is disabled","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1458178897000}

trans-unit.source: Customize your company Box experience for managed and external users. You can set the logo, color scheme and messaging users see when they work in the Box web application. {learnMoreLink}
trans-unit.target: Pas de Box-ervaring van uw bedrijf aan voor beheerde en externe gebruikers. U kunt een logo, kleurschema en berichten instellen die gebruikers zien wanneer zij met de Box-webapplicatie werken. {learnMoreLink}
trans-unit.note: {"sourceComment":" Section description for enabling custom branding for an enterprise. {learnMoreLink} is a link to the help page","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463428540000}

{"sourceComment":" Section title for enabling custom branding for an enterprise","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463428541000}

trans-unit.source: Files must be under 1MB in size
trans-unit.target: Bestanden moeten kleiner zijn dan 1 MB
trans-unit.note: {"sourceComment":" Error message in notification when uploading an invalid logo","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1458179682000}

trans-unit.source: Only JPG, JPEG, and PNG files are supported
trans-unit.target: Alleen JPG-, JPEG- en PNG-bestanden worden ondersteund
trans-unit.note: {"sourceComment":" Error message in notification when uploading an invalid logo","targetComment":null,"includedInLocalizedFile":true,"status":"APPROVED","variantComments":[],"createdDate":1463428556000}

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your logo.
trans-unit.target: Er is een probleem opgetreden bij het uploaden van uw logo.
